description: This dashboard works with postgres_exporter for prometheus

panels.description: CPU time spent busy vs idle, split by activity type
panels.title: CPU Basic

panels.description: Percentage of filesystem space used for each mounted device

targets.expr: ((node_filesystem_size_bytes{instance="$node", job="$job", device!~"rootfs"} - node_filesystem_avail_bytes{instance="$node", job="$job", device!~"rootfs"}) / node_filesystem_size_bytes{instance="$node", job="$job", device!~"rootfs"}) * 100

panels.title: Disk Space Used Basic

panels.description: Overall CPU busy percentage (averaged across all cores)
panels.title: CPU Busy

panels.description: System load  over all CPU cores together
panels.title: Sys Load

panels.description: Real RAM usage excluding cache and reclaimable memory
panels.title: RAM Used

panels.description: RAM and swap usage overview, including caches
panels.title: Memory Basic

panels.description: Per-interface network traffic (receive and transmit) in bits per second
panels.title: Network Traffic Basic

panels.description: Shows the online status of power supplies (e.g., AC, battery). A value of 1-Yes indicates the power supply is active/online
panels.title: Power Supply
General Counters, CPU, Memory and File Descriptor Stats

panels.description: Average user and system CPU time spent in seconds.
panels.title: Average CPU Usage

panels.description: Virtual and Resident memory size in bytes, averages over 5 min interval
panels.title: Average Memory Usage

targets.expr: pg_stat_activity_count{datname=~"$datname", instance=~"$instance", state=~"idle|idle in transaction|idle in transaction (aborted)"}

panels.description: Total amount of data written to temporary files by queries in this database. All temporary files are counted, regardless of why the temporary file was created, and regardless of the log_temp_files setting.
panels.title: Temp File (Bytes)

targets.legendFormat: write_time - Total amount of time that has been spent in the portion of checkpoint processing where files are written to disk.
sync_time - Total amount of time that has been spent in the portion of checkpoint processing where files are synchronized to disk.

title: my dashboard
